name: Korah
description:
Korah, the king of Qudra gets his face stolen by the evil king Qudamah, of the
criminal infested city of Kadarasto by forcing the Old Witch of the unknown
land to give him the face-lifting potion. Korah turns into a Wabasq, an evil
creature that torments cities, towns and villages. Unrecognizable by his own
friends and citizens, King Korah must battle his way out of the kingdom into
the unknown to get the reversal potion and confront sinister Qudamah for his
face back.
